whatsappMessage: Hello, I would like to know more about your services
heroSubtitle: Photography for travel, business, and unforgettable moments.
aboutText1: Hi! I'm Bruna, but you can also call me Bru (that's a thing from São Paulo, right?!). London has always been my dream as a teenager, and in 2018, I was fortunate enough to make it come true. I moved here with my husband and daughter, and it was here that our family grew even more with the arrival of two more kids.
aboutText2: Since then, I've been looking for new experiences, and it was in this amazing city that I found the perfect setting to turn my passion into a profession. Photography has always been my great love, and my biggest wish is to capture special moments — just as my mother always did — because I believe everyone deserves to preserve unforgettable memories!
contactText1: Do you want to transform your moments into unforgettable photos? Whether it's for your trip, your brand or a special portrait, I'm here to capture your essence in every click.
contactText2: Send me a message and let's talk about the perfect session for you!

section1Content2: ! We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information, in accordance with the
section1Content5: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) - United Kingdom
section2Content: We may collect the following data when you use our website or get in touch:
section2List1: Informations about your browsing on the website (cookies and similar technologies).
section3Content: Your data may be used for:
section3List3: Improve the user experience on the website;
section3List4: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations.
section4Content: We do not sell or share your data with third parties, except when necessary to comply with legal obligations or when there is explicit consent.
section5Content: Your data is stored securely and protected against unauthorized access. We implement technical and organizational measures to ensure the security of your information.
section6List3: Request the deletion of your data (except when there is a legal need for retention);
section6List4: Retire your consent for the use of data.
section6Contact: If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us by email:
section7Content: Our website may use cookies to improve your experience. You can disable them in your browser settings, but this may affect some site functionality.
section8Content: This policy may be updated at any time to ensure compliance with applicable laws. We recommend that you review this page periodically.
